Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove package-lock.json from tracking for cross-platform compatibility

Cloudflare Pages build was failing because npm ci requires exact dependency sync.
package-lock.json generated on Windows was missing cross-platform esbuild packages.
By excluding it from git, Cloudflare will generate a fresh lock file during build.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
